quotes.quote: No moral system can rest solely on authority.
quotes.author: A. J. Ayer

quotes.quote: To punish me for my contempt for authority, fate made me an authority myself.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The peaceful transfer of authority is rare in history, yet common in our country. With a simple oath, we affirm old traditions and make new beginnings.
quotes.author: George W. Bush

quotes.quote: Truth is the secret of eloquence and of virtue, the basis of moral authority; it is the highest summit of art and life.

quotes.quote:
Show me the man who keeps his house in hand,
He's fit for public authority.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: Every great advance in natural knowledge has involved the absolute rejection of authority.
quotes.author: Thomas H. Huxley

quotes.quote: Wherever there is authority, there is a natural inclination to disobedience.
quotes.author: Thomas Haliburton

quotes.quote: There is no fettering of authority.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: If you wish to know what a man is, place him in authority.
quotes.author: Yugoslav Proverb
